title: Energy in the Body - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/7/19
itunes:title: Energy in the Body - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/7/19
description:
George Noory and science writer Paul LeMay explore his research into energy waves in the human body, whether they help mental communication like ESP and telepathy, and what force in the universe controls all that energy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
